root.title: Enable Local Manifest Installation With Winget
root.description: Detects changes to the AppInstaller (winget) policy. Specifically the activation of the local manifest installation, which allows a user to install new packages via custom manifests.
root.author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)

falsepositives.item: Administrators or developers might enable this for testing purposes or to install custom private packages
